item.title: Diablo III
item.dc:creator: @DMXXXX DMXXXX
item.description:
@DMXXXX wrote:

[quote=“nicks, post:32, topic:437240”][quote author=cyndibal link=topic=539952.msg3953563#msg3953563 date=1332529564]
hey xEnt,
I was an avid diablo II player. I had several level 99 characters on hardcore mode, including a hammerdin, javazon, and summoner. I once possessed 6/40 javalins, one of the rarest spawnable items in the game. I also was granted a diablo III beta key around 3 months ago. That being said, I am extremely disappointed in the game. Graphics are terrible, and the gameplay is comparable to diablo I. Hopefully the full game changes my opinion.
[/quote]
Your obviously a lier since there is no summoner class in diablo 2… i’ve played for years…[/quote]

For someone who played for years, you don’t know what a fucking summoner is? Try a necromancer with all summoning skills, hence ‘summoner’ fucking moron.

Read full topic

Graphics are terrible, and the gameplay is comparable to diablo I. Hopefully the full game changes my opinion.

Your obviously a lier since there is no summoner class in diablo 2… i’ve played for years…[/quote]

whos gonna play, release date may 15.

obviously gonna be a great game.

played the beta pretty sick but I wanna play a pvp but didn’t try it yet

diablo 2 was pay2win, its just u had to use google… they obv just want a lol
[/quote]Translation:
To succeed in Diablo 2, you had to spend real life money in order to get the best items.
No idea what the google bit means.

very false…all u had to do was trade on d2jsp
[/quote]Hey, I was translating, thats what he said.[/quote]

its alot easyer to just use google

item.title: Diablo III
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:17, topic:437240”][quote author=NoLives link=topic=539952.msg3953572#msg3953572 date=1332530249]

[quote author=vortex link=topic=539952.msg3953491#msg3953491 date=1332519716]

[quote author=NoLives link=topic=539952.msg3953405#msg3953405 date=1332512284]
Gonna download a cracked Diablo 3 and play the living fuck out of it.

[/quote]Mmm yeah, no, not really. The game is online only, you are connected to bnet at all times. Good luck playing it in a year or two if people bother to write any decent private servers.
[/quote]Just like Starcraft2 couldnt be cracked?
[/quote]Just like Diablo III doesn’t have any kind of single player at all and all the data is transfered from the server?[/quote]Oh, thats what you meant.
Owell, then it wont be as exciting.

Read full topic
